unnormalised: tumchi BSES bill online bhortaana, soveechhi fee asaa ki naahi te nischit karunk yaad thevaa. kednaakai, credit card vaprungelean tanka Rs. 10-20 jaasti laagtat. tech bhaxen, PhonePe vo Paytm sarkhya apps-ancher cashback offer-anchendi dhyan di, tumkam ₹50-₹100 bachat zaina zait! aanik tumhi mhoinyache 7 ver mhoinyan poilim bhartat zalear, zaite providers 2% discount ditat, mhunn tumche bhugtan poilim karun ghya!
normalised: tumchea mahite khatir, tumchem B-S-E-S bill online bhortana, sulabh shulk (convenience fee) asaa kai te nischit karaak yaad theva. kiteakoi krediit kaart vaprunkhatir kadook kadook dha te vis rupia chodd ghaltaat. tosoch, PhonePe va Paytm sarkhya app-acher cash back offer-anchem laksh diia; tumi panchash te ek shata rupia vachovn ghetat! ani tumi mhoiineache saat taarike adim bhortat zalear, zaite porovnnedar don tanke discount ditaat, mhunnch tumchem bhugtaan fattak dhaddat!
